first.sub: IT consulting from the heart of Europe
first.title: Automation- Zentric
first.text: Founded in 2023, we have over 30 years of experience in various industries and areas of information technology. Our Services include tailored IT solutions and consulting aimed at increasing efficiency and performance for our customers and seamlessly connecting with the company's business objectives.

second_section.title: Our expertise
second_section.sub: We provide a number of significant benefits to our customers.

product_section.title: Our product
product_section.sub: We provide a number of significant benefits to our customers.

updog.title: Central management of In-Place Upgrades for Linux systems
updog.text: It is a tool written in Python that makes it easy to run a local HTTP server for file sharing. With it, you can quickly share files by providing access to a specific folder through a web browser.

services.title: Our services
services.sub: Individualized consultation, as each use case is unique.

dev.title: Software Development
dev.sub: With over 30 years of experience in all areas of software development, we craft innovative and robust software solutions tailored to the individual needs of our clients. From concept to implementation, we follow a meticulous development process to ensure the delivery of high-quality software.

cloud.title: Cloud Technologies
cloud.sub: We understand the transformative power of the cloud and apply this knowledge to develop customized cloud solutions that drive digital transformation. From cloud design to ongoing optimization of leading cloud platforms, we assist our clients in fully harnessing the benefits of the cloud and efficiently achieving their business objectives.

solution.title: Solution Architecture
solution.sub: Well-designed architecture forms the foundation for the success of IT projects. From the initial concept to implementation, we emphasize precision and scalability to assist our clients in overcoming their business challenges and sustainably implementing effective IT strategies.

agile.title: Agile Transformation
agile.sub: Agility is not just a method but a cultural change. We promote flexibility, collaboration, and continuous improvement by introducing agile practices and integrating them permanently into the corporate culture. In doing so, we support our clients in strengthening their innovation capabilities, responding more quickly to market changes, and achieving sustainable competitive advantages.

data.title: Data Management
data.sub: In an era where data science is gaining increasing importance, we acknowledge the crucial role of effective data management. From data capture to storage and analysis, we place great emphasis on the highest quality and integrity. We assist our clients in generating real value from their data, gaining innovative insights, and strengthening their competitiveness.

updog_page.title: OS Upgrade
updog_page.sub: A reliable and efficient solution for upgrading Linux systems across multiple hosts and environments.

problem.title: The Problem?
problem.sub: RHEL 7 maintenance support ends on June 30, 2024.

cards.title: Current tools offer no centralized solution to upgrade OS infrastructure efficiently.

1.title: Long Upgrade Times
1.sub: Upgrades can range from months to years, depending on the size of the infrastructure.

2.title: High Manual Workload
2.sub: Organizations may require additional experts, leading to elevated costs.

3.title: Likelihood for Inconsistencies
3.sub: Repetitive manual tasks are prone to human errors and may result in operational issues.

4.title: Lack of Documentation
4.sub: Current tools offer no comprehensive reports that provide a clear audit trail for accountability.

tools: Current tools offer no centralized solution to upgrade OS infrastructure efficiently.

work.title: How does upDog work?
work.sub: The entire upgrade process, unified within one solution.
work.text: Modular architecture integrating seamlessly with existing IT infrastructures.

why_us.title: Why upDog?
why_us.sub: Designed to centrally manage upgrades, providing efficiency, scalability, and maintainability.
why_us.9: Fixed price per host for reports

about.title: About Us
about.sub: A reliable and efficient solution for upgrading Linux systems across multiple hosts and environments.
about.text: At automation-Zentric, we go beyond simple consultation and foster long-term partnerships. We deliver customized solutions that not only enhance efficiency but also seamlessly align with the business goals of our clients. We accompany you on your journey of technological progress, where experience meets innovation to elevate your company to new heights.
